alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 10:41AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Montana, including the following county, Madison. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1036 AM MST, local law enforcement reported an ice jam on the Madison River near Ennis. Minor flooding is ongoing. - Although conditions have improved slightly, ice jamming is still present around Ennis. The next update will be Tuesday afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ennis. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
